desc: My Body butters are a luxurious comfort item that not only moisturize the skin but also enrich it with vitamins and nutrients. They are created from natural ingredients such as Coconut Oil, Mango Butter, Shea butter and Vitamin E Oil. Body Butter is Thicker than lotions, Leaving Your Skin Looking Younger with a Glow.

layout.text: Promotes Circulation and Healthy Skin Cell Growth. Loaded With Vitamins A,E&F Helps Soften & Smooth Dry Skin. Treats Conditions Such As Eczema
